articles.author: Nick Bromberg
articles.title: Alabama scores 27 straight points to stun Oklahoma 34-24 and advance to Rose Bowl vs. Indiana - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: No. 9 Alabama ripped off 27 straight points after a horrific start to beat No. 8 Oklahoma 34-24 in the first round of the College Football Playoff on Friday ...
articles.content:
No. 9 Alabama ripped off 27 straight points after a horrific start to beat No. 8 Oklahoma 34-24 in the first round of the College Football Playoff on Friday night.
The Sooners led 17-0 with 10:51 to… [+9375 chars]
